text: @realDonaldTrump Trump saying he knew all along it was a pandemic, needs to explain why at his rallies and his family member and Fox News call it a Democratic Hoax. Just saying, it's hard to trust liars! Hopefully the real experts will do the right thing for Americans. Trump doesn't know how!
